alert.note: Alert for Harnett; Johnston; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 5:14PM EDT until August 15 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Harnett County in central North Carolina... Southern Wake County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 514 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cary to Fuquay-Varina to near Lillington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Clayton, Angier, Apex, Holly Springs, Knightdale and Lake Wheeler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
